extraSections.text:
# Introducing Hamster Village

Hamster Village is a collection of 1111 unique Hamster who live in own village. The village is on NEAR Blockchain. Our main target is to build the friendliest and largest NEAR village. Create our Own the best interesting and addictive farm game play-to-earn.

# Roadmap

### ✅ Phase Generation 
 * Launch Twitter & Discord
 * Launch Website
 * Member Whitelist

 ### ✅ Phase Evolution 
 * Marketing & Collaborations
 * Mint & Listing
 * DAO Launch

 ### ✅ Phase Prime 
 * Buy-Back of NFTs for Royalty
 * NFT Airdrop for Holders
 * Branded Clothing and Merch

 ### ✅ Phase Domination
 * Develop Play-to-Earn Metaverse Farm Game
 * Develop Custom Tokens for Game
 * Launch Token
